clintock:AminoKeyword.DESCRIPTION: An amino acid is a structural unit of proteins. Activates at the end of each turn.

clintock:AdenineKeyword.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, gains #b2 #yBlock.

clintock:BaseKeyword.DESCRIPTION: Orbs that represent the fundamental units of DNA.

clintock:ChromosomeKeyword.DESCRIPTION: DNA molecule. Can be mapped as part of #yThe #yGenome #yProject.

clintock:CytosineKeyword.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, deals #b3 damage to a random enemy.

clintock:DeletionKeyword.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable status card that removes a #Linked #Base at the end of the turn.

clintock:ExpressKeyword.DESCRIPTION: Activates a #yLinked #yBase at the end of each turn.

clintock:GuanineKeyword.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your next turn, gains #b Energy.

clintock:Intron.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable status card that prevents #yBases from #yLinking.

clintock:Knockout.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable status card that prevents #yBases from #yExpressing.

clintock:LinkKeyword.DESCRIPTION: Puts a #yBase into your first empty slot. If no empty slots exist, #yBinds an #yAmino acid to make room.

clintock:PolypeptideKeyword.DESCRIPTION: Group of #yAmino acids that activate at the end of each turn.

clintock:Transposon.DESCRIPTION: Adds a copy of the card to your hand when played.

clintock:ThymineKeyword.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, deals #b2 damage to ALL enemies.
